Package com.parkingfinder.parkingservice.service

Class ParkingSpotDataLoader

java.lang.Object
com.parkingfinder.parkingservice.service.ParkingSpotDataLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataLoader, Subject
@Component
@EnableAsync
public class ParkingSpotDataLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subject, DataLoader
Component with scheduled job for reading database updates of parking spots on a fixed delay. Implements the Subject interface and notifies observers when new data has been read from database
Author:
Milena Trajanoska

      @Async @Scheduled(fixedDelay=1800000L) public void loadDataFromDatabase()
